content: hey crafters we're back with part 2 of our mimic video so this time we're going
to paint it and finish it up and unleash it on our players so let's go to the
table and finish up that Minich any crafters I finished the chest itself
like I did in the DMS craft number 111 part to that finishing mini treasure
chest but this vid details the mimic part so let's move on and I'll show you
how I did that to start on these as quarrel and as you can see I've been
filling in the mouth the tongue around the gums and the eyes so I'm just gonna
fill all that out the interior the chest with this coral color and there it is
it's all dried up now I'm gonna use a cherry red a dark cherry red and I'm
going to give a very wet application it'll still give a lot of nice shading
to that interior area the tongue and the palate and the gums and all that stuff
so paint all that on and I'll let it dry up and now I'm going to do the base with
a pewter gray and since it's mostly going to be in Dungeons I figured I'd do
the base gray you can do whatever color you want so I'm just going to do a
fairly wet application on the base and cover up the base and it's ready to go
now I want to do the teeth so I'm going to use an off-white kind of a linen
color and the spikes also on the arm so I'll just paint all the teeth with this
make sure you get all around the teeth and the spikes also yeah I'm not gonna
paint the whole arm just the end of the spike okay so I've got all that done now
I'm gonna do the eyes I'm going to use a white okay and I want to be a little
brighter than the teeth and so I'm gonna paint all around make sure you don't get
the hole in the and the bead there you leave it for the pupil and paint are
around you've got the eyes looking great don't want to do some aging on the teeth
I'm going to use a golden brown and this is a very wet application and it just
gives a little bit of age to those I think it was a nice effect I also want
to do some extra detail on the chest itself so I'm going to do some
highlights with this tan I'm going to see I'm going around the edges with this
thin brush it's very wet down so it's easy to work with doing some flanking on
the back so I'll just pull the the wet tan along the edge and it really gives a
nice effect now I want to do some bloodshot bloodshot effect on the eyes
somebody's that cherry red and just pull with a small
brush just pull up from the edge of the eyes gives it a really kind of fun look
it's already kind of crazy looking but it just gives it a little extra crazy I
guess and there we go there's a guy so now I want to do the base I'm going to
do some light gray and that'll be a nice highlight to that so I'm just gonna put
on some mutts like some country or dolphin gray around there nice another
thing I want to do is some shading so I'm using some black and I'm gonna do
this fairly wet and I'm gonna do some shading around the around the bottom of
the chest to make it look like it's even popping up more so that's a nice effect
there like that now the guy it really looks nice with a
wet moss so I'm going to use this mini wax poly acrylic clear gloss but it's
water-based so it's super easy to clean up I really like using it so here's my
guy I think it looks really great but I think that gloss I'll really bring it
out nominee is a brush that's soft brush and I like to use this because on the
hot glue sometimes a bristly brush can pull the color off the hot glue so I
like to use a soft brush when I do this so let's go around the whole MA the eyes
the tongue everything fill that in here we have a room set up with our classic
chest from DMS craft number 111 and yeah looking good there and the great thing
about this is the mimic is done in the same technique so we can really just
replace the chest with our mimic and have it go nuts I'll give you a closer
look at that I really like how how fun he looks his eyes is popping out they're
all crazed look in those giant teeth the barbs on the side just really vicious
looking mimics so there you go enjoy hey crafter sounds like there's a
conversation inside let's check it out this economy I'm just really upset about
this now she's all gone what are we gonna do now we're gonna find the road
and Roderick thinks she was kind of cute too ma'am I am Melvin the mimic and I
want to challenge all you crafters to make one of me and post it on the
Facebook and forum
